name: The Silent Maze
description:
You wake up deep within a sinister labrinth. Can you find your way out? But beware of the hungry evil creatures lurking in the darkness...

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Shift: Run
  • Space: Slow walk
  • Mouse: Camera controls
  • P: Pause

That's it! The desktop version also supports playing with a controller.

Game made for Quarantine Jam, april 2020. You can download the source code from our GitHub!
